query:
INSERT INTO cis2_token_events (
                    index_per_token,
                    transaction_index,
                    token_index,
                    cis2_token_event
                )
                SELECT
                    COALESCE((SELECT MAX(index_per_token) + 1 FROM cis2_token_events), 0),
                    $1,
                    tokens.index,
                    $3
                FROM tokens
                WHERE tokens.token_address = $2
